PyTrajectory User’s Guide¶

About PyTrajectory¶

PyTrajectory is a Python library for the determination of the feed forward control to achieve a transition between desired states of a nonlinear control system.

It’s based an a study work written at the Technical University Dresden.

Usage¶

Examples¶

Translation of the inverse pendulum¶

An example often used in literature is the inverse pendulum. Here a force acts on a cart with mass . In addition the cart is connected by a massless rod with a pendulum mass . The mass of the pendulum is concentrated in and that of the cart in . The state vector of the system can be specified using the carts position and the pendulum deflection and their derivatives.

With the Lagrangian Formalism the model has the following state space representation where and
